verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> also came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> you <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> who have <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H7200>don't<s%> see, who have <S%H241>ears<s%> to <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H8085>don't<s%> hear; for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H1121>Therefore,<s%> you son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H6213>prepare<s%> your <S%H3627>stuff<s%> for <S%H1473>moving,<s%> and <S%H1540>move<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight;<s%> and you shall <S%H1540>move<s%> from your <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight:<s%> it may be they will <S%H7200>consider,<s%> though they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

You shall bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> your <S%H3627>stuff<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> as <S%H3627>stuff<s%> for <S%H1473>moving;<s%> and you shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> yourself at <S%H6153>even<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> as when men go <S%H4161>forth<s%> into <S%H1473>exile.<s%>
<S%H2864>Dig<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and carry your stuff out that <S%H3318>way.<s%>

In their <S%H5869>sight<s%> you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> it on your <S%H3802>shoulder,<s%> and carry it <S%H3318>forth<s%> in the <S%H5939>dark;<s%> you shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> so that you <S%H7200>don't<s%> see the <S%H776>land:<s%> for I have <S%H5414>set<s%> you for a <S%H4159>sign<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

I <S%H6213>did<s%> so as I was <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H3627>stuff<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> as <S%H3627>stuff<s%> for <S%H1473>removing,<s%> and in the <S%H6153>even<s%> I <S%H2864>dug<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> with my <S%H3027>hand;<s%> I brought it <S%H3318>forth<s%> in the <S%H5939>dark,<s%> and <S%H5375>bore<s%> it on my <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>
In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> has not the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6213>you,<s%> What are you doing?

<S%H559>Say<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> This <S%H4853>burden<s%> concerns the <S%H5387>prince<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> among whom they <S%H8432>are.<s%>

<S%H559>Say,<s%> I am your <S%H4159>sign:<s%> like as I have <S%H6213>done,<s%> so shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3212>them;<s%> they shall go into <S%H1473>exile,<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>

The <S%H5387>prince<s%> who is <S%H8432>among<s%> them shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> on his <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> in the <S%H5939>dark,<s%> and shall go <S%H3318>forth:<s%> they shall <S%H2864>dig<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> to carry <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3680>thereby:<s%> he shall cover his <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> he shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

My <S%H7568>net<s%> also will I <S%H6566>spread<s%> on <S%H8610>him,<s%> and he shall be taken in my <S%H4686>snare;<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans;<s%> yet shall he not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4191>it,<s%> though he shall die there.

I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> toward every <S%H7307>wind<s%> all who are <S%H5439>around<s%> him to <S%H5828>help<s%> <S%H102>him,<s%> and all his bands; and I will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> after <S%H310>them.<s%>
They shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I shall <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them through the <S%H776>countries.<s%>

But I will <S%H3498>leave<s%> a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of them from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> from the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and from the <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%> that they may <S%H5608>declare<s%> all their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> where they <S%H935>come;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H7494>quaking,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> your <S%H4325>water<s%> with <S%H7269>trembling<s%> and with <S%H1674>fearfulness;<s%>

and <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H127>land,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> concerning the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H1674>fearfulness,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> their <S%H4325>water<s%> in <S%H8078>dismay,<s%> that her <S%H776>land<s%> may be <S%H3456>desolate,<s%> and all that is <S%H4393>therein,<s%> because of the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of all those who dwell <S%H3427>therein.<s%>

The <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> shall be laid <S%H2717>waste,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be a <S%H8077>desolation;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> what is this <S%H4912>proverb<s%> that you have in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H748>prolonged,<s%> and every <S%H2377>vision<s%> <S%H6>fails?<s%>

<S%H559>Tell<s%> them <S%H559>therefore,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> I will make this <S%H4912>proverb<s%> to <S%H7673>cease,<s%> and they shall no more use it as a <S%H4911>proverb<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> but <S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H3117>them,<s%> The days are at <S%H7126>hand,<s%> and the <S%H1697>fulfillment<s%> of every <S%H2377>vision.<s%>
For there shall be no more any <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H2377>vision<s%> nor <S%H2509>flattering<s%> <S%H4738>divination<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For I am <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and the <S%H1697>word<s%> that I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> shall be <S%H6213>performed;<s%> it shall be no more <S%H4900>deferred:<s%> for in your <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> will I <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H1697>word,<s%> and will <S%H6213>perform<s%> <S%H1696>it,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1004>behold,<s%> they of the house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H2377>vision<s%> that he <S%H2372>sees<s%> is for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H6256>come,<s%> and he prophesies of times that are far <S%H7350>off.<s%>

Therefore <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> None of my <S%H1697>words<s%> shall be <S%H4900>deferred<s%> any <S%H1697>more,<s%> but the word which I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> shall be <S%H6213>performed,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
